roleset.name: discard, throw away, dismantling for scraps
roleset.note: SCRAP-V NOTES: No Vncls. Checked by Julia, 11/2010. (from scrap.01-v)
SCRAPPING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, scrap.01. No corresponding vNcls. (from scrapping.01-n)

example.name: passivized
example.text: ...if Mr. Cray leaves or if [the product-design project he heads]-1 is scrapped *trace*-1.

example.name: active
example.text: The company yesterday also said it was scrapping one of its major new products, a 760-megabyte drive.
example.arg: one of its major new products, a 760-megabyte drive.

example.name: both args
example.text: THE SNP have attacked Labour over their scrapping of the 10p rate of income tax that left millions worse off.
example.arg: of the 10p rate of income tax that left millions worse off

roleset.name: fight
roleset.note: SCRAP-V NOTES: No Vncls. Checked by Julia, 11/2010. (from scrap.02-v)

example.name: ethnic unrest
example.text: And hardly surprising, many residents trying to cope with the city's other problems are constantly on edge, one ethnic group scrapping with another.
